effect.shortEffect: Changes attacking Pokémon's abilities to Mummy on contact.
effect.full: Whenever a contact move hits this Pokémon, the attacking Pokémon's ability changes to Mummy. multitype is unaffected. If a Pokémon with moxie knocks this Pokémon out, the former's ability will change without taking effect.

description.black-white: Contact with this Pokémon spreads this Ability.
description.black-2-white-2: Contact with this Pokémon spreads this Ability.
description.x-y: Contact with the Pokémon spreads this Ability.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Contact with the Pokémon spreads this Ability.
description.sun-moon: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker’s Ability to Mummy.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker’s Ability to Mummy.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker’s Ability to Mummy.
description.sword-shield: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker’s Ability to Mummy.
